tests.title: should start writing from top/left

tests.title: should accept line & row for positioning
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should accept line & row for positioning

tests.title: should add another line if text is too long
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should add another line if text is too long
tests.code:
const msg = new Message();
msg.write('Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ' +
    'consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed ' +
    'diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt');
assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(), '#==============================================#\n' +
    '# L O R E M   I P S U M   D O L O R   S I T    #\n' +
    '# A M E T ,   C O N S E T E T U R              #\n' +
    '# S A D I P S C I N G   E L I T R ,   S E D    #\n' +
    '# D I A M   N O N U M Y   E I R M O D          #\n' +
    '# T E M P O R   I N V I D U N T                #\n' +
    '#                                              #\n' +
    '#==============================================#\n');

tests.title: should work with words > board length
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should work with words > board length

tests.title: should allow to use NEXT_LINE flag
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should allow to use NEXT_LINE flag

tests.title: should support the NO_SPACE_BETWEEN flag
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should support the NO_SPACE_BETWEEN flag
tests.code:
const msg = new Message();
msg.write('Rindfleisch')
    .write('etikettierungs', { position: MessageWritePosition.NO_SPACE_BETWEEN })
    .write('ueberwachungs', { position: MessageWritePosition.NO_SPACE_BETWEEN })
    .write('aufgaben', { position: MessageWritePosition.NO_SPACE_BETWEEN })
    .write('uebertragungs', { position: MessageWritePosition.NO_SPACE_BETWEEN })
    .write('gesetz', { position: MessageWritePosition.NO_SPACE_BETWEEN })
    .write('(das)');
assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(), '#==============================================#\n' +
    '# R I N D F L E I S C H                        #\n' +
    '# E T I K E T T I E R U N G S                  #\n' +
    '# U E B E R W A C H U N G S A U F G A B E N    #\n' +
    '# U E B E R T R A G U N G S G E S E T Z        #\n' +
    '# ( D A S )                                    #\n' +
    '#                                              #\n' +
    '#==============================================#\n');

tests.title: should work with a very basic example
tests.fullTitle: Message table() should work with a very basic example

tests.title: should just fill the space available if too full
tests.fullTitle: Message table() should just fill the space available if too full
tests.code:
const msg = new Message();
msg.table([
    ['now', 'Daily'],
    ['13:00', 'Super Secret Meeting'],
    ['16:30', 'Awesome Presentation']
]);
assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(), '#==============================================#\n' +
    '# N O W       D A I L Y                        #\n' +
    '#                                              #\n' +
    '# 1 3 : 0 0   S U P E R   S E C R E T          #\n' +
    '#             M E E T I N G                    #\n' +
    '#                                              #\n' +
    '# 1 6 : 3 0   A W E S O M E   P R E S E N T -  #\n' +
    '#==============================================#\n');
